ratings.comment: Dr. Ward is a solid lecturer and very kind person. She explains some parts of the course better than others, but this is understandable considering it is a survey course. You should do well as long as you do the readings and pay attention in lecture. She cares about students inside and outside of the classroom, and is always available to help.

This class was super easy with Kelly Ward. All the quizzes and exams are online and the only thing you have to show up for is discussion. Prof made the topic very interesting and this is a great option if you need a natural science credit as a non-STEM major. 100% take if you need the credit!

I loved Professor Ward, she is very knowledgeable about this course and is a very genuine person. I found the course to be very fulfilling and interesting as a whole, and Professor Ward's teaching really enhances it. She has been one of my favorite professors so far and I honestly think everyone could benefit from taking this course!

Professor Ward is a great lecturer, and I thoroughly enjoyed taking her class. There are a LOT of readings, but you can get away with not reading all the course content for the week. I found that she expressed disappointment in her students quite often for very trivial things, which was a bit frustrating.
